text: Be Silent, My Sorrow, Be Silent () is a 1918 Russian silent drama movie directed by Pyotr Chardynin.Дата - 95 лет назад «Огонек» писал о завершении съемок фильма «Укразия» в Одессе"Молчи, грусть, молчи", или Вся правда о Вере Холодной It stars Vera Kholodnaya, Pyotr Chardynin, and Ossip Runitsch. ==Actors== *Vera Kholodnaya – Paula,a circus artiste *Pyotr Chardynin – Lorio,a clown-acrobat *Ossip Runitsch – Zaritskiy, a barrister *Vitold Polonsky – Telepnev, a rich gentleman *Vladimir Maksimov – Volyntsev, an artist == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1918 drama movies Category:Movies directed by Pyotr Chardynin
title: Be Silent, My Sorrow, Be Silent
